mainProduct.name: Intelligent Behavior Analysis Equipment Set
mainProduct.description: The AIB Intelligent Behavior Analysis System applies artificial intelligence (AI) for video surveillance and automatic detection of abnormal behaviors on camera systems. Deep Learning technology enables accurate recognition of dangerous or violation situations, sending real-time alerts to operators. The system supports zone setup, security scenario creation, camera-based configuration, and visual monitoring. AIB detects diverse behaviors including restricted area intrusion, climbing, fighting, weapon carrying, vandalism, smoking, gambling, as well as emergencies like suicide risk or abnormal falls.
